pkgmetadata.longdescription: Inverse Regression for Text Analysis // Multinomial (inverse) regression inference for text documents and associated attributes. For details see: Taddy (2013 JASA) Multinomial Inverse Regression for Text Analysis arXiv:1012.2098 and Taddy (2015, AoAS), Distributed Multinomial Regression, arXiv:1311.6139. A minimalist partial least squares routine is also included. Note that the topic modeling capability of earlier 'textir' is now a separate package, 'maptpx'.
